A6 Don't think of it as an end in & of itself but 1 way to drive a new, better, more engaging & productive EE experience #swchat
A5 When done right, Social Intranet isn't an add-on - it is tied to a wide variety of #HR & operational activities #swchat
A4 Important to get them conditioned to how things are done starting on day 1... #swchat
A4 Start social conversation be4 first day of work: i.e. preboarding hubs, new hire communities, ask a mentor, etc.  #swchat
Simple & on target! RT @tomspiglanin: Q3) demonstrate whats in it for them of course #socintr #swchat
A3  .. and keep directing the conversation back to the Social Intranet.   #swchat
A3 Make it the only way to collaborate on certain project, processes, initiatives.  #swchat
A3 One idea: embed it within activities that are core to their job #swchat
Very true! MRT @anitaloomba: #SoMe should B integrated into an org’s communication & collaboration efforts & not viewed as an add-on #swchat
A2 Must prove to people it pays to contribute: i.e. results/decisions implemented as a result of social contributions #swchat
RT @megbertapelle @smccollo @anitaloomba internal soc. netwrk can streamline comm, facilitate collab & keep evry1 connected #socintr #swchat
A1 No informal champions/influencers, unclear objectives for purpose of social intranet & why someone should contribute #swchat
A1 Do not embedded in core work activities, becomes just another to-do.. #swchat
